attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the disclosure that the personal details of 25 million people have been "lost" - Alistair Darling should be relieved of his post with immediate effect.

The potential for ID fraud is beyond all recognised thought, with enough information now potentially in the public domain to affect nearly half of all UK citizens.

As the minister responsible for HMRC, the buck should stop with him.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
